VADP.summary: Vado Corp. engages in the embroidery business in the European Union. It manufactures embroidery products that include embroidery on cut, as well as finished products, such as work wear, pennants, T-shirts, jerseys, sweatshirts, baseball caps, windbreakers, coveralls, uniforms, towels, hats, jackets, linen, blankets, and others. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Nitra, Slovakia.
